title: http.ServeFile() sets "Content-Type" to "text/plain" for (all?) files with known MIME
body:
by **c.m.brandenburg**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Write simple web server, with only one handler that serves one file using
http.ServeFile() (e.g., http.ServeFile("foo/bar.html")).

What is the expected output?
Web client receives "foo/bar.html" GET request with "Content-Type"
set to "text/html".

What do you see instead?
Web client receives "foo/bar.html" GET request with "Content-Type"
set to "text/plain".


Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
8g

Which operating system are you using?
Linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
release/release.r59

Please provide any additional information below.
